mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PHOTO (photo_id, photo_name, photo_date, photo_res1, photo_res2, photo_path, HASHTAG_ID1, HASHTAG_ID2, HASHTAG_ID3, content_Type, file_Size, thumb, member_id) VALUES (SEQ_PHOTO.currVAL, #{photoName}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{photoRes1}, #{photoRes2}, #{photoPath}, #{hashTagId1}, #{hashTagId2}, #{hashTagId3}, #{contentType}, #{fileSize}, #{thumb}, #{memberId})

INSERT INTO PHOTO (photo_id, photo_name, photo_date, photo_path, file_Size, content_Type, thumb, photo_res1, photo_res2) VALUES (SEQ_PHOTO.currVAL, #{photoName}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), #{photoPath}, #{fileSize}, #{contentType}, #{thumb}, #{photoRes1}, #{photoRes2} )
mapper.update: UPDATE PHOTO SET photo_name = #{photoName}, photo_date = #{photoDate}, photo_res1 = #{photoRes1}, photo_res2 = #{photoRes2}, photo_path = #{photoPath} WHERE PhotoId = #{photoId}
mapper.select: SELECT photo_id, photo_name, photo_date, photo_res1, photo_res2, photo_path, MEMBER_EMAIL, thumb, content_type, file_size, photo_res1, photo_res2, PHOTO_LIKE, READ_COUNT, HASHTAG_ID1, HASHTAG_ID2, HASHTAG_ID3 FROM PHOTO p, MEMBER m WHERE m.member_id = p.member_id AND photo_id = #{photoId}
SELECT photo_id, photo_name, photo_date, photo_res1, photo_res2, photo_path, member_id, thumb FROM PHOTO WHERE PHOTO_NAME = #{photoName}

SELECT photo_id, photo_path, MEMBER_EMAIL, thumb, content_type, file_size, PHOTO_LIKE, READ_COUNT, HASHTAG_ID1, HASHTAG_ID2, HASHTAG_ID3 FROM PHOTO p, MEMBER m WHERE m.member_id = p.member_id order by p.PHOTO_ID desc
